thread.title: Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
thread.title_full: Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs

title: Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
text:
Updated: 1:19 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 | Posted: 1:19 p.m. Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 Sabathia to check into alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs Related View Larger New York Yankees starting pitcher CC Sabathia embraces a teammate after he helped the Yankees clinch a wild card berth in the playoffs after the Yankees defeated the Boston Red Sox 4-1 in a baseball game in New York, Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Sponsored Links The Associated Press NEW YORK â€” 
Yankees pitcher CC Sabathia is checking into an alcohol rehabilitation center and will miss the postseason. 
The team released a statement from the pitcher Monday, a day before New York plays Houston in the AL wild-card game. 
Sabathia says he took the step to "receive the professional care and assistance needed to treat my disease." 
He adds: "It hurts me deeply to do this now, but I owe it to myself and to my family to get myself right. I want to take control of my disease." 
Sabathia says he intends to be back with the Yankees next season. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
